meanings.definition: Relating to the characteristics of a population, such as age, gender, income, etc.
meanings.sent1: The demographic study focused on the age distribution of the community.
meanings.sent2: Marketers analyze demographic data to understand their target audience better.
meanings.sent3: The demographic trends showed that more young people were moving into the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her choice of music was a demographic indicator of her age group.
meanings.sent5: The demographic shift towards an older population was evident in the census results.

meanings.definition: A specific segment of a population sharing common characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The marketing campaign targeted a specific demographic of young professionals.
meanings.sent2: The elderly demographic in the town needed more accessible facilities.
meanings.sent3: The demographic of dog owners in the park was surprisingly diverse.
meanings.sent4: She felt a strong connection with the demographic of single parents in the community.
meanings.sent5: The demographic of tech-savvy individuals was growing rapidly in the city.
